Home → Libraries → Rushmere

Rushmere (Suffolk Libraries Local)

Manager: Tom Veasey

Ransomes Sports Pavilion, Sidegate Avenue, Ipswich
IP4 4JJ

  • Tel:
  • Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk
  • Facebook

Branch updates

  • Browse and borrow books, attend a range of activities and use IT facilities.
  • Part of the Suffolk Libraries Local scheme, the sessions are funded by Ipswich Borough Council's North East Area Committee and Suffolk County Councillor Sandra Gage's Locality Budget.
  • Self-service available during activities.
  • Payment facilities not available at Suffolk Libraries Local branches. Call 01473 351249 for any payments.

Day Hours
Wednesday 1330-1630

IT and printing facilities

  • Free internet access on library Chromebooks

Regular events and activities

Children's events

Homework club

Wednesday, 1515-1600

Staff available to help with homework projects, borrowing books etc. Children under 7 must be accompanied by an adult.

Singing and stories

Wednesday, 1415-1445

Stories, nursery rhymes and songs for 0-4 year-olds.

Upcoming special events

No upcoming special events.
